```{python}
import yaml
from IPython.display import display, Markdown, HTML
from string import Template

def make_person_description(name, attrs):
    s = """
        <html>
            <style>
                .container {
                    display: flex;
                    align-items: flex-start;
                    justify-content: center;
                }

                .image-container {
                    flex-shrink: 0;
                    width: 150px;
                    margin-right: 20px;
                    display: flex;
                    flex-direction: column;
                    align-items: center;
                }

                img {
                    max-width: 100%;
                    max-height: 100%;
                }

                .text-container {
                    display: flex;
                    flex-direction: column; /* Stack description and icons vertically */
                    align-items: flex-start; /* Align content to the left */
                    padding: 10px;
                }
                
                .social-icons {
                    display: flex;
                    justify-content: center;
                }

                .social-icons a {
                    width: 20px; /* Adjust size as needed */
                    margin: 0 10px; /* Adjust spacing */
                    text-decoration: none;
                }
            </style>
            <body>
                <div class="container">
                    <div class="image-container">
                        <img src="$picture">
                    </div>
                    <div class="text-container">
                        <div class="text">
                            $description
                        </div>
                        <div class="social-icons">
                        <a href = "mailto:$mail"><i class="bi bi-envelope-fill fs-4" style="color: red;"></i></a>
                        <a href = "$link"><i class="bi bi-linkedin fs-4"></i></a>
                        <a href = "$scholar"><i class="bi bi-mortarboard-fill fs-4" style="color: green;"></i></a>
                        <a href = "$personal"><i class="bi bi-globe fs-4" style="color: orange;"></i></a>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </body>
            <br>
        </html>
    """
    template = Template(s)
    description = "<p>" + attrs["description"] + "</p>"
    description = description.replace("<name>", "<b>" + name + "</b>") # Add bold name
    picture = attrs.get("picture", None)
    mail = attrs.get("mail", None)
    link = attrs.get("linkedin", None)
    scholar = attrs.get("scholar", None)
    personal = attrs.get("personal", None)
    return template.substitute(picture = picture, description = description, mail = mail, link = link, scholar = scholar, personal = personal)


yaml_data = yaml.safe_load(open("people.yml"))
 
positions = {
    "Permanent researchers": "permanent",
    "Research engineers": "engineer",
    "Lecturers": "lecturer",
    "Postdocs": "postdoc",
    "PhD students": "phd",
    "Alumni and visitors": "alumnus"
}

for long_pos, short_pos in positions.items():
    display(Markdown(f"## {long_pos}"))
    for name, attrs in yaml_data.items():
        if attrs["position"] == short_pos:
            display(HTML(make_person_description(name, attrs)))
```
